item.title: Tech Stacks for building apps
item.description: source ◆ @nextjs – framework ◆ @vercel – deployment ◆ @nextauthjs – auth ◆ @prisma – ORM ◆ @railway – postgres ◆ @tailwindcss – CSS ◆ @framermotion – animations ◆ @radix_ui – UI primitives ◆ @typescript + @PrettierCode + @geteslint – code quality
